In this text I will explain how to create a small script file.

= Introduction =
Go to console and type:
{{{
java -jar compiler.jar --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --js /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog/projekte/datepickerClosure.js --js_output_file datepickerClosure-compiled.js
}}}

or even better:

{{{
java -jar /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure-compiler/compiler.jar --js /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog/base.js --js /var/www/closure-library-read-only/closure/goog/projekte/datepickerClosure-compiled.js
}}}
